channel.title: Homes on WELCOME
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on WELCOME

item.description: Research Interests Computer architecture Processor design: Performance and security About     I am an Associate Researcher at the State Key Laboratory of Information Security, Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences. I earned a PhD degree in Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2021, where I worked with Professor Rui Hou. I received the ME degree from the School of Electronic Engineering, University Of Electronic Science and Technology of China in 2017 and the BE degree from the School of Electrical Engineering and Automation, Henan Polytechnic University in 2014.

item.title: Honors
item.description: APPT 2021 Best Paper Award IEEE TC Feature Paper of the Month: July 2021

item.title: Experience
item.description: 2021.8-Present, Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences Location: No Jia 89, Minzhuang Road, Haidian District, Beijing Title: Associate Researcher Duties: Participate in the development of active security processor 2017.9-2021.7, Institute of Information Engineering, Chinese Academy of Sciences PhD degree Major in Processor Architecture and Security 2014.9-2017.7, School of Electronic Engineering, University Of Electronic Science and Technology of China ME degree Major in Circuit and System 2010.
